text: Andreas Schockenhoff (February 23, 1957 - 13 December 2014) was a German politician of the CDU. From 1990 until his death in 2014, he served as a member of the German Bundestag. In the general election in 2013, he was elected the seventh consecutive year as a direct mandate for the federal electoral district Ravensburg in the German Bundestag. Schockenhoff was born in Ludwigsburg, Germany. Schockenhoff died in Ravensburg, Germany, aged 57.spiegel.de 14.
